lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ability of microfinance to help hardworkers overcome the hardships and bring needed services to their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large insurance company.  My job involves buying needed materials and managing the company's computer systems.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have worked in microfinance in Chicago and in Durban, South Africa and know that these loans make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide small loans to diverse business owners in the Chicago land area.

lenders.name: Arun
lenders.loan_because: Kiva rocks!!

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I believe Jesus Christ wants me to help others

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the resources to be able to.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: This feels like an interesting way to assist others in improving their lives and their communities, rather than simply mailing a check to a charity or npo.
lenders.occupational_info: Day job, designing systems to make real estate transactions more efficient.  Side job, preparing music and humor audio and writing to make laughter more common.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in this world one Person at a time

lenders.name: Chris Canfield
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.  Some of us happened to be given a few chances, and it's our responsibility to spread those around.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: I have a great life and I want to give back to others.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It is within my means to help others toward their goals.

lenders.name: Euisan
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: medical student

lenders.name: My_ma_&_ba
lenders.loan_because: Every time I make a loan, I send loving energies forward to Ma who is in Heaven now and Ba who lives in Singapore. Every loan is love sent by them and every loan sends love to them.
lenders.occupational_info: My life work is to serve. I haven't been able to do much of it in a very tangible way but I'd like to think that I try to every chance I get. Kiva has given me a much needed outlet to do exactly that. Good work, all at Kiva!

lenders.name: Scarlett
lenders.loan_because:
1. The UN, and by UN I mean the power-tool of the US, and it's branches aren't doing anything you could call fair or non-exploitive while keeping a straight face 
2. Lawrence Summers
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying at a liberal arts school to hopefully find a way to change the mindsets of capitalist Washington as well as those who choose to remain pleasently oblivious to the exploitation and evil that exists in this world market

lenders.name: webtutor
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea

lenders.name: Magne Rekdal
lenders.loan_because: Trust and partnerships bring the world small steps forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for users in the health care sector.

lenders.name: Hoke
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism is the only form of true sustainable development

lenders.name: Christophe
lenders.loan_because: People need money.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, program and implement software in support of the business needs of my clients. It's an area where I can be truly creative without otherwise having any artistic talent.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: we should all help out when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Research and development microbiology

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the inherent abilities of us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-governmental organization that contributes to grassroots programs all over the world.  I am also a student of microfinance and resource creation.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving.  I enjoy seeing people succeed around the world.

lenders.name: Bethel Youth Group
lenders.loan_because:
We care and we can.
It's a small amount of money to help someone get a better life.
We have money and we care!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a Mennonite youth group from Winnipeg, Canada.

lenders.name: YBP Guide
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a gift taught from the Bible. I feel honored to 'teach men to fish', instead of just giving them fish.
lenders.occupational_info: We have discussions, online, about the impact and social relevance of being Black in America.

lenders.name: Roberts-Gaal family
lenders.loan_because: this is a way to get our kids directly involved in helping others.

lenders.name: Diane & Steve
lenders.loan_because: Hoping to make a small difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Gian Mario
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people to reach serenity and independance.

lenders.name: Julie Roberts
lenders.occupation: We Sell the Genuine Four Leaf Clover Accessories
lenders.loan_because: We want to bring good luck to those in need and also to contribute back into the community. We help by planting seeds which can possibly spring forth into life-sustaining plants for these entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: Many customers have been touched after getting our clovers and have come back telling us that they have good luck in their jobs, careers, relationships as well as lottery. Similarly, we also would like to help out those in the third world countries by providing what help we can by helping aspiring businesses grow.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: how can I not?  There is so much need.

lenders.name: Stephanie & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed to have had good opportunities in life; we'd like to help others find their way in life too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations develop policies and practices that make working for a company rewarding for its employees and profitable for the company.

lenders.name: Lang
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes a little makes all the difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make high strength polymer-based thin films and measure its physicial and chemical properties using scattered laser light.

lenders.name: Ric
lenders.loan_because: I have so much in comparison to most of the world's population.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research to prevent obesity in children.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I believe in non-governmental solutions.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of programmers who create software for the internet.

lenders.name: lauren
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to empower people and to really help change someone's life for the better. I know people helped me along the way and i want to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a large restaurant in downtown tokyo

lenders.name: Doug & Giselle
lenders.loan_because: We want to show our kids how to be part of a larger world outside of the US.  And we really want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: Doug works for a technology company in the US and writes books.  Giselle is an artist.

lenders.name: Seth Mowshowitz
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the world’s financial system is the main contributing factor to global inequality. Kiva helps to mitigate this situation by preventing investment capital from being captured within the system. The result is that individuals and small businesses from deprived areas who need loans to thrive can request and receive loans successfully and without exploitation.
lenders.occupational_info: As a designer my philosophy is user-centred. As a musician I focus my efforts on developing the language of a movement towards social equality.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to support someone who has the courage to run their own business, despite the difficulties.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and truly believe that every little bit helps.  =)

lenders.name: Ray & Cindy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a community library in a semi-rural area of Colorado.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I strongly support what Kiva is doing to elevate the life situations of entrepreneurs in developing countries...plus my sister works for Kiva and the whole team is awesome!
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs achieve their goals and promote international trade development

lenders.name: Gjagiello
lenders.loan_because: I realize that the amount I spend on lunch in a week here in San Francisco could probably start a business in other parts of the world. Credit has helped me, and now that microlending has proven itself, I'm happy to help others improve their situation.

lenders.name: ET Evans
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a farmer in colorado, usa.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Executive in an international capital markets firm.  Banking for big companies.

lenders.name: Sherpani

lenders.occupational_info: Breathe | Give | Stretch | Go - Lifestyle Bags for Women

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others set up a sustainable infrastructure for their business and economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for major technology companies by promoting their business to various forms of media (newspapers, magazines, websites, etc).

lenders.name: World Wings Miami
lenders.occupation: philanthropic former Pan Am flight attendants
lenders.occupational_info: The mission of World Wings International Inc. is to unite former Pan American World Airways flight attendants in order to promote philanthropic, civic and cultural activities through our special friendships.

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: I know it makes a difference and it makes me feel great

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I am so thankful for the opportunities and freedom experienced as a female in the United States.  This is my way of giving back.

lenders.name: Allegra
lenders.occupation: Engineer or Accountant. It's a numbers thing.
lenders.loan_because: build a family business, build a better community.  Build a community, build a country.  Build a country, build a better world.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I know that starting and growing a business is a challenging endeavor .  I believe that every entrepreneur deserves the opportunity to achieve success and  it makes me feel good to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a company that sells attraction passes to tourists

lenders.name: Federica
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the best way to help people help themselves, with the dignity given by their own job. I hate banks!Banks are ruining the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I run my own business in Tuscany, Italy. My country is not really rich and I am not rich either, but I try to keep up with what I think I am and can do. I work in the field of communication. I have a 10 years old son. I love the sea shore and the colors.

lenders.name: d64editor.com
lenders.loan_because: There are other people in the world that can make better use of a relatively small amount of money than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist with maintaining a medium sized computer network.

lenders.name: Tom and Meg
lenders.loan_because: We are passionate about development and convinced there is enough wealth in this world for everyone to have a fulfilling, healthy life. What's spare change to us can be life-changing to others.

lenders.name: Anita Grant Ltd
lenders.loan_because: We want to help entrepreneurs in the developing world move one step closer to their dream of prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: Anita Grant Ltd is a family owned business. Providing natural & organic  hair care & skin care goodies.

lenders.name: Gopinath
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have the confidence of succeeding, if given right opportunities and resources. Kiva provides such a great opportunity connecting us with the people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an industry which creates software solutions to enable business processes for a large Company with a complex business model.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I know what a privilege it is to have good work opportunities, and I think everyone in the world should have them too.

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: this is a great site-- so much opportunity to help

lenders.name: Sierra
lenders.loan_because: I've been so fortunate to have strangers invest in my education and future, and I'm working to give it back.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: When I've traveled to impoverished areas, I have seen the need for this type of lending. I love the community aspect of Kiva and the fact that my initial donation can just keep on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: painter, potter, graphic artist, herbalist

lenders.name: Elliott
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able so say have have helped someone else in need!
lenders.occupational_info: Being a baby is rough!  I eat, sleep, drink milk, and well play!  It is an important job, but someone has to do it.  My other job is to make a contribution to the future.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make all the financial transactions for my company and maintain records.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: To repay what others have given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying agriculture, trying to understand how we can produce enough food for ourselves, while still protecting our land for the future.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.

lenders.name: The Riley-Burnett Family
lenders.loan_because: We all share the same hopes and desires, to take care of our families and be safe and happy.  We hope that our small loans help the people who receive them accomplish their dreams.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Helping others to a better life is both easy and rewarding
lenders.occupational_info: I repair electronic equipment in the aviation field.  Now retired I spend my time repairing and riding bicycles

lenders.loan_because: I think that people can change the world by making money to buy stuff.

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher in a secondary school, experienced at both the high school and middle school levels.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: I was interested in the stories of each woman; one a 53 year old widow (which I am) and the other a single middle aged woman, both trying to maintain their independence and dignity at this station in life. I imagine the challenge is 10 times harder for them than I could ever imagine. I extend God's blessings through the funding I'm able to provide each beautiful lady!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a performing artist/producer and support all forms of the cultural arts in the diverse City of Los Angeles, California, USA. They would include visual arts, dance, music, theatre, film, TV & radio.

lenders.name: Sahil

lenders.name: Wey Ling
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help

lenders.name: Carmen

lenders.name: Nik

lenders.name: Reed

lenders.loan_because: I started my own business and I want to give others the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I make quilts for my family and friends to enjoy.  I sell the supplies to make them so others can as well.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in personal responsibility, and working hard for what you have.  I do not believe in charity hand outs.  I look forward to seeing more and more people pull themselves out of poverty, and succeed in their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a health care company, keeping all the computers running.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a web developer. With the explosion of the internet which connects everyone globally, I use my skills and know how to better mankind.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Why not.

lenders.name: DukeDeLaet
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. While I have a strong heart for charity, this type of loan allows me to get "the best bang for my buck" when it comes to helping people create change, because it can be used over and over again.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a neighborhood Chamber of Commerce that help businesses grow in Lincoln Park.

lenders.name: St. John's High School

 "Love one another. Help one another. Pray for one another."
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the process of setting up health and welfare benefits.

lenders.name: CCCSM

lenders.occupational_info: Making the world a better place on person at a time.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the part of life that always returns more than you invest.

lenders.name: Louisville High Justice

By our study and by our efforts, we seek to help eradicate hunger and poverty.

lenders.name: Emily & Brent

lenders.name: Lorena
lenders.loan_because: Those who give, receive.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a secure way to make a difference.  I would like to think that if the circumstances were reversed, I might be able to turn to someone who could share their faith that I might create a better life for myself and my family in this very practical way.

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.occupational_info: Fun and Rewarding, I design software applications

lenders.name: Lara

lenders.name: Al
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva loans are not charity.  "Give someone a fish." vs. "Teach someone to fish."  
The Kiva system is a win-win proposition, for both the lender and the lendee.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design and build custom applications for businesses that have special needs which can not be met by commercially available software.
   I do pro bono work for various non-profit organizations in my local area.
   As a Microsoft Access MVP, I volunteer my time on the Access newsgroups to answer questions from users from all over the world.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I want to put my money where my idealistic heart is. Kiva just helps my little corner of the world reach out to other corners in need.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: It's better to help people learn how to fish...

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
"The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit." 
By : Nelson Henderson

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: The bible says thou shalt be the lender and not the borrower. I believe in turning borrowers into lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a family owned Online retail store we call "The Peoples Seller" Deuteronmy 8:18

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can. It's such a great way to make a little difference in this world. Isn't it cool what we can all do together.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company make sure they have enough employees to take care of business.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Because a better question is why I don't lend. Plus, it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a software company that makes software for banks in the US.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I think Kiva is a brilliant idea. Being in business myself, I understand how hard it is to grow a business even under good economic conditions. The challenges that the entrepreneurs on Kiva face are far, far, far greater and I applaud and greatly admire them all for their commitment, ambition and tenacity! I'll be doing my best to get other businesses involved.

I only wish I could lend to all of the entrepreneurs listed on Kiva!

Involvement in Kiva is also a great project for families; helping to raise and maintain our awareness of just how tough things can be for others and that we all have a responsibility to help where we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a renewable energy company in Australia that sells solar panels etc. and also provide marketing and ecommerce consultancy services; i.e. helping small businesses succeed on the Internet.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because:
I think that microcredit is a beautiful and powerful concept for helping the developing world, and it makes me very happy to make a demonstrable difference in the life of somebody who really needs it.

Also, microloans are very complicated, logistically speaking, and purely altruistic... If such a thing can succeed through kindness and creativity, it will confirm my best suspicions about the human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying computer science. I hope to one day design video games.

lenders.name: kirian
lenders.loan_because: I want to try theother side of life because I believe success in lifedependson how you succeed tostrike an equilibrium between accademics ans business.I have been doing business and schooling at the same time. And now that I have reach the point that I wanted,I want to concerntrate on business.
lenders.occupational_info: Being a student and blending with business is something I very much admired because the knowlegede acquired helps you in your busness which of course makes it easy forme to handle it well.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in a single parent household whose income was always hovering around the poverty line. But because we lived in North America, my siblings and I have had opportunities children of poor families in other countries have not. I want to do whatever I can to help parents in other parts of the world with lower incomes provide for their children and ultimately give them some of the opportunities they deserve.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Law Clerk and I assist Lawyers at my firm with their preparation for high profile law suits.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: There are far to many with dreams but lack the financial means to achieve those dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: US Navy Police Officer

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: few of us are in a position to make changes that affect millions, but I can choose to build a life made of smaller, cumulative actions that positively influence others.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain my library's website.  At the end of the day, I go home knowing that what I do brings people in contact with knowledge.  You can't put a price on that.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life, and want to help give others a chance to improve their lives, and their children's.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classes in microbiology and biotechnology at a university, and hope that my students will help to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: these folks deserve it. And the world needs them.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: the people who  participate in this program are worth investing in!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the day to day, non-sales related operations of a small, niche furniture manufacturer/retailer.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to live a life where I have the opportunity for education, health care and strong support systems. These allow me to be and do anything I want and I think everyone should have the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance giving emergency medical treatment and taking sick and injured people to hospital.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: with what i earn i can happily live and don´t have to be afraid to go to bed hungry. if somebody else can say the same for themselves because of a little help from me life looks much nicer to me too
lenders.occupational_info: i meet people from many different backgrounds and exchange ideas and views

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: There are a lot of good and hard working people out there. They just need an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software developer.

lenders.name: Chingyi
lenders.loan_because: I could make a difference by loaning. Even $25 can help a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to attend trade shows and sell fancy stationery and gifts to international buyers.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe aid is more effective at grass-roots level than given to large organisations who have to pay administrative costs.
lenders.occupational_info: Documenting cross-cultural concerns expats should consider when working overseas.

lenders.name: alan
lenders.loan_because:
This is a great way for a gift to "keep on giving" by being re-invested with many recipients over time. 

I like that I can learn a little about the people using the money I lend, and I like that I can pick and choose the recipients.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a digital agency and invest in tech startups

lenders.name: Rickard
lenders.loan_because: Loans to entrepreneurs is a better way to help, instead of just giving. It gives people the opportunity to earn their own money and helps to develop the economy. As the proverb says: “Give someone a fish and you feed him for a day;  Teach someone to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.”

lenders.name: Rosalyn
lenders.loan_because: I support the efforts of individuals who want to make their lives better.  It makes me feel good to know that I have helped a few individuals, even in a small way.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: it a simple way to add more beauty and goodness to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My goal, mission, and life passion is to facilitate the most efficient and effective healing and transformation so you can live now with the level of holistic health you were designed for.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
And that's not me, but our dog Pearl. She has a good heart, so she's trying to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a professor.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to work their way out of poverty in a dignified way.  Micro finance provides that opportunity.

lenders.name: B.P. Lending Division
lenders.loan_because: Every dollar that one spends on excessive luxuries could have gone to shelter, defend, clothe, or feed another Human.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a local government hospital to improve the quality and efficiency of healthcare.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because:
We're all in this together.......
I AM my brothers keeper....
lenders.occupational_info: Contributing to the greater good

lenders.name: Yannick
lenders.loan_because: this is a good way to help people to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Making Research for an Environmental Company

lenders.name: ALFEN
lenders.loan_because:
I really want to help people to change their own lifes. This is one very good way.
Let money from the rich part of the world work in poor regions.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I live by 3 main tenets:
1.  Have fun!
2.  Make Money!
3.  Do good and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I build and develop biotech companies.

lenders.name: Steve,Vicky,Erin,Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I like to invest in people instead of assets. Also I think it is important to "think globally, act locally"
lenders.occupational_info: Our family includes 2 engineers and 2 students.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: It is a way of acting out my faith.

lenders.name: marlene
lenders.loan_because: A helping hand up for every one.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a sales rep most of my life and am now retired.  I care for my two grandchildren two days each week and travel at every opportunity

lenders.name: Jay + Alice + Kurt +Maya
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for us to use our success to enable others to create their own successes.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jay is an entrepreneur and has seen the impact that can have on the hundreds of families the business touches. 
Alice is a strategy consultant for Bridgespan a consultancy focused on building successful non-profit organizations.

lenders.name: Bailey
lenders.loan_because: Love Wins
lenders.occupational_info: Play at school...Hang out with my family...Go to church.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get the tools they need to be self-sufficient and proud.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with all the legal work necessary to start a new business.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that are less fortunate than I.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I think that loans are a much more effective way of helping someone than just giving away money. You're much more responsible with it if you have an obligation to pay someone back.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy companies, grow them, and then, hopefully, sell them for a profit.

lenders.name: Jack Ray,
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the American Navy and widowed.  My wife died from ALS

lenders.name: Jorge Rodrigues
lenders.loan_because: I want.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share His blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer engineer and I assist companies in designing their systems to recover from catastrophic disasters.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and the feeling that you get after you loan is amazing!
lenders.occupational_info: I am only a junior, so I volunteer and donate when opportunities present themselves. Luckily, I can volunteer at a soup kitchen every weekend :)

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it's a brilliant opportunity to make a huge impact with the relatively small amount I have to give.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I move money around. From people with it and willing to invest, to people who need the money.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: Many of us in the US have been blessed with so much.  If the small amount I loan here can help someone somewhere; I want to be a part of that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the head administrator in a small, rural school in Montana.

lenders.name: Sophie & Harley
lenders.loan_because: My mom and dad teach my sister Harley and I that we should always help others and give of ourselves. They say it is a blessing and is to be done with joy and gratitude. Harley wouldn't sit still for her picture to be taken so I get to be spokesdog.
lenders.occupational_info: We jump up and down, wag our tails, smile really big and give our family kisses when they walk through the door. After that we spend all of our time keeping them company, especially at night while they sleep.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the non-profit arm of a large credit union.

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the free market and in people.
